member.name: IDirectManipulationCompositor2.AddContentWithCrossProcessChaining
member.summary: Associates content (owned by the component host) with the compositor, assigns a composition device to the content, and specifies the position of the content in the composition tree relative to other composition visuals. Represents a compositor object that associates manipulated content with drawing surfaces across multiple processes.

param.name: content
param.para: The content to add to the composition tree.
content is placed between parentVisual and childVisual in the composition tree.
Only primary content, created at the same time as the viewport, is valid.

param.name: device
param.para: The device used to compose the content.
param.div: Note device is created by the application.

param.name: parentVisual
param.para: The parent visuals in the composition tree of the content being added.
parentVisual must also be a parent of childVisual in the composition tree.

param.name: childVisual
param.para: The child visuals in the composition tree of the content being added.
parentVisual must also be a parent of childVisual in the composition tree.

member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDirectManipulationCompositor2
member.summary: Represents a compositor object that associates manipulated content with drawing surfaces across multiple processes.
